prompt: Re-write this music caption in three different styles. You can mix the order of the instruments.
inputs: This song includes Reed, Organ, Bass, Guitar, Drums, but without Piano.
captions:
Style 1: Reed, Organ, Bass, Guitar, Drums - no Piano in this song.

Style 2: This composition omits Piano, but features Reed, Organ, Bass, Guitar, and Drums.

Style 3: Piano-less, this song is composed of Reed, Organ, Bass, Guitar, and Drums.
